lead_paragraph: PEARLMAN--Bernard, of New York City, New York on January 2, 2016 at the age of 93 years. Husband of Sylvia. Father of Robert and Allan. One grandson, Daniel, also survives him. Funeral service Tuesday, 11am, at the Schwartz Brothers-Jeffer Memorial Chapels, 114-03 Queens Boulevard, Forest Hills. Interment at the Calverton National Cemetery, Calverton, NY. 1/3
